com.isoterik.mgdx.ai.fsm.conditions

Class GroupCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.ai.fsm.conditions.GroupCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICondition
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndCondition, OrCondition

    public abstract class GroupCondition
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICondition
    A condition that evaluates other conditions. Concrete subclasses provide group specific methods of evaluating the sub-conditions.
